rules.title: Treat players and your fellow Admins with respect.
Must be 18 to join and be a member.
Discriminatory jokes and language, hate speech (which calls out a group by their age, race, gender), etc. is prohibitive.
Verbal abuse, insults, or threats towards others will not be tolerated.
Friendly banter can escalate quickly, if you are asked to stop. Then stop.
Admins must follow the same rules as the players do. You are not “above” the rules that you enforce.
Do not post invite links to other server.
Do not use the list of members to PM advertisements.

Use the channels for their intended purpose. #general is 
for general discussion, #squad-talk is for 
squad etc. If you are unsure, post in #general.
Admins reserve the right to delete any post.
Gore, death, or other inappropriate conetent is prohibited.
Do not discuss politics/religion or any other controversial topics.
BE RESPECTFUL TO YOUR FELLOW GAMERS! INSIDE AND OUTSIDE OF THE COMMUNITY!
Admin's Right
rules.description:
All rules are up to an admin’s discretion, if they feel that the actions 
and/or behavior of a person inside of the LiQuid Gaming discord is 
“out of hand” they may use the tools necessary to ensure the 
discord remains in a state followed by the rules above.
